title: Inside the Parker Trade Deadline Edition! Scherzer Sweepstakes, Yankees Sellers, Cubbies Teardown, MLB Tonight's Fran Charles
itunes:title: Inside the Parker Trade Deadline Edition! Scherzer Sweepstakes, Yankees Sellers, Cubbies Teardown, MLB Tonight's Fran Charles
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, the trade deadline is approaching and Rob looks at which team will come out on on top of the Max Scherzer sweepstakes, the latest on the Trevor Bauer's administrative leave being extended as his sexual assault investigation continues, if the Yankees might be sellers at the deadline. Also, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week, Foul or Fair, Betting on the Bases and Jonesin' for Baseball.

Guests: MLB Tonight Host Fran Charles talks trade deadline, if the Cubs are going to to sell off the last of their title team, and if the Nats should move their ace Max Scherzer. MLB Bro Writer Malik Wright looks at why the Rangers may have a star in call up Curtis Terry.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
